posts.post_content: does anyone have a t3 hofer for under $120 or is that not even possible. ive always wanted one but i know that they are pricey and this is a long shot but might as well try.
would say not very likely, maybe half a card?
Probably not for that amount but Deals are there to be had you just have to look alot and spend a little more.  Maybe closer to $250-300?

Most commons go for more than that, even beaters. You'll never touch a HOF'er for that. I agree with the $250-$300 range from my experience.
Good luck, they're great!

posts.post_title: Not likely, but you never know
posts.post_content: As Andrew stated earlier, deals are to be had if you look around.  It might be tough to stay within your $120.00 budget and you may need to up it to about $200.  I was able to get this hof'er for under $175 through an auction house last year.
commons go for about that, might be able to score with an altered one for closer to 150+
I've seen a few fire-damaged ones sell for that range.  They were a little burnt - but certainly affordable.
i dont mind it coild be chewed on missing corner,folded in half that doesnt matter to me i just want hofer.
